org.zaproxy.zap.authentication

Class AuthenticationMethodType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationMethodType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType, HttpAuthenticationMethodType, ManualAuthenticationMethodType, ScriptBasedAuthenticationMethodType

    public abstract class AuthenticationMethodType
extends Object
    A type of authentication method. This class also acts as a factory for creating AuthenticationMethod objects and for creating the options panels used for configuring both the AuthenticationMethod and the AuthenticationCredentials.

    The implementors of new authentication methods should also implement a corresponding AuthenticationMethodType. The system automatically detects and loads Authentication Method Types and, through them, the corresponding Authentication methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AuthenticationMethodType.UnsupportedAuthenticationMethodException
      Thrown when an unsupported type of credentials is used with a AuthenticationMethod .

      • getUniqueIdentifier

        public abstract int getUniqueIdentifier()
        Gets the unique identifier of this Authentication Method Type. It has to be unique among all Authentication Method Types.
        Returns:
        the unique identifier

      • buildOptionsPanel

        public abstract AbstractAuthenticationMethodOptionsPanel buildOptionsPanel(Context uiSharedContext)
        Builds the options panel that can be used to fully configure an authentication method.

        This method just builds an empty options panel. For binding an existing method to the panel, AbstractAuthenticationMethodOptionsPanel.bindMethod(AuthenticationMethod) should be used.

        Parameters:
        uiSharedContext - the shared context on which the panel should work
        Returns:
        the abstract authentication method options panel
        See Also:
        hasOptionsPanel()

      • hasOptionsPanel

        public abstract boolean hasOptionsPanel()
        Checks if the corresponding AuthenticationMethod has an options panel that can be used for configuration.
        Returns:
        true, if it needs one
        See Also:
        AuthenticationMethodFactory#buildOptionsPanel(int);

      • hook

        public abstract void hook(ExtensionHook extensionHook)
        Hooks the Authentication Method Type with other components of ZAP, if needed. This method should is called only ones, when authentication types are loaded.

        For example, PopupMenus can be registered.

        Parameters:
        extensionHook - the extension hook

      • loadMethodFromSession

        public abstract AuthenticationMethod loadMethodFromSession(Session session,
                                         int contextId)
                                                    throws SQLException
        Loads an authentication method from the Session. The implementation depends on the Authentication method type.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the authentication method
        Throws:
        SQLException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • createAuthenticationCredentials

        public abstract AuthenticationCredentials createAuthenticationCredentials()

        the authentication credentials

      • getSetMethodForContextApiAction

        public abstract ApiDynamicActionImplementor getSetMethodForContextApiAction()
        Gets the ApiAction that can be used to set an authentication method of this type for a context.

        This api action will be handled by executing the ApiDynamicActionImplementor.handleAction(JSONObject) method.

        In the ApiDynamicActionImplementor.handleAction(JSONObject) method, if the new type of method differs from the current type of method, a call should be made to apiChangedAuthenticationMethodForContext(int) to make sure changes are propagated.

        Returns:
        the api action, or null if there is no way to set this method type through the API

      • getSetCredentialsForUserApiAction

        public abstract ApiDynamicActionImplementor getSetCredentialsForUserApiAction()
        Gets the ApiDynamicActionImplementor that can be used to set the authentication credentials of the corresponding type for an User of a context.

        This api action will be handled by executing the ApiDynamicActionImplementor.handleAction(JSONObject) method.

        Returns:
        the api action, or null if there is no way to set this method type through the API

      • apiChangedAuthenticationMethodForContext

        protected static void apiChangedAuthenticationMethodForContext(int contextId)
        Called when the authentication method for a context is changed through an API call.

        Makes sure the Users are wiped so the authentication credentials for them match the Method.

        Parameters:
        contextId - the context id
